TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed StateRuntime extends System.Object implements class System.Web.SessionState.IStateRuntime
Public NotInheritable Class StateRuntime Implements IStateRuntime
public ref class StateRuntime sealed : System::Web::SessionState::IStateRuntime

summary.span: 管理儲存在 ASP.NET 狀態服務中的工作階段 (Session) 資料。

span.span: Manages session data stored in the ASP.NET state service.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支援的管理工作階段狀態的-處理序外使用名為 ASP.NET 狀態服務的 Windows 服務的選項。ASP.NET supports the option of managing session state out-of-process using a Windows service called the ASP.NET state service. 類別會用此服務中的 unmanaged 程式碼來管理工作階段資料。The class is used by unmanaged code in this service to manage session data. 這個類別支援.NET Framework 基礎結構實作的 ASP.NET 狀態服務，且不想要直接從您的程式碼使用。This class supports the .NET Framework infrastructure implementation of the ASP.NET state service and is not intended be used directly from your code. ASP.NET 狀態服務不是 ASP.NET 工作階段狀態管理; 的預設方法ASP.NET 預設支援同處理序的管理工作階段狀態。The ASP.NET state service is not the default method of ASP.NET session-state management; ASP.NET supports an in-process management of session state by default. 它也支援可管理 Microsoft SQL Server 資料庫中的工作階段狀態，並可自訂的工作階段狀態管理解決方案的第二個跨處理序選項。It also supports a second out-of-process option that manages session state in a Microsoft SQL Server database and enables custom session-state management solutions. 如需工作階段狀態儲存體選項的詳細資訊，請參閱[工作階段狀態模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4)。For more information about session-state storage options, see [Session-State Modes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員支援.NET Framework 基礎結構實作的 ASP.NET 狀態服務，且不想要直接從您的程式碼使用。This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure implementation of the ASP.NET state service and is not intended be used directly from your code. 如需工作階段狀態儲存體選項的詳細資訊，請參閱[工作階段狀態模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4)。For more information about session-state storage options, see [Session-State Modes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4).

summary.span: 由 ASP.NET 狀態伺服器用於處理工作階段資料。

span.span: Used by the ASP.NET state server to process session data.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ProcessRequest (IntPtr tracker, int verb, string uri, int exclusive, int timeout, int lockCookieExists, int lockCookie, int contentLength, IntPtr content);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ProcessRequest(native int tracker, int32 verb, string uri, int32 exclusive, int32 timeout, int32 lockCookieExists, int32 lockCookie, int32 contentLength, native int content) cil managed

Public Sub ProcessRequest (tracker As IntPtr, verb As Integer, uri As String, exclusive As Integer, timeout As Integer, lockCookieExists As Integer, lockCookie As Integer, contentLength As Integer, content As IntPtr)
public: virtual void ProcessRequest(IntPtr tracker, int verb, System::String ^ uri, int exclusive, int timeout, int lockCookieExists, int lockCookie, int contentLength, IntPtr content);

abstract member ProcessRequest : nativeint * int * string * int * int * int * int * int * nativeint -> unit override this.ProcessRequest : nativeint * int * string * int * int * int * int * int * nativeint -> unit
MemberSignature.Usage: stateRuntime.ProcessRequest (tracker, verb, uri, exclusive, timeout, lockCookieExists, lockCookie, contentLength, content)

param.name: tracker
param.span: 儲存在 Unmanaged ASP.NET 狀態伺服器中之物件的 指標。

span.span: An pointer to an object stored in the unmanaged ASP.NET state server.
The action to take on the object.
An identifier for the session.

param.name: exclusive
param.span: 存放區中物件的存取類型。

span.span: The type of access to objects in the store.

param.name: timeout
param.span: 工作階段資料儲存的分鐘數。

span.span: The number of minutes the session data is stored.

param.name: lockCookieExists
param.span: 值，指出鎖定 Cookie 是否存在於從 ASP.NET Web 伺服器向 ASP.NET 狀態伺服器提出的原始要求中。

span.span: A value that indicates whether the lock cookie exists in the original request from the ASP.NET Web server to the ASP.NET state server.

param.name: lockCookie
param.span: 工作階段狀態中鎖定的擁有者。

span.span: The owner of the lock on the session state.

param.name: contentLength
param.span: 工作階段所儲存的資料長度 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: The length, in bytes, of the data stored for the session.

param.name: content
param.span: 要為 Unmanaged ASP.NET 狀態伺服器中之工作階段儲存內容的 指標。

span.span: An pointer to the content stored for the session in the unmanaged ASP.NET state server.

summary.span: 由 ASP.NET 狀態伺服器用於處理工作階段資料。

span.span: Used by the ASP.NET state server to process session data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支援的管理工作階段狀態的-處理序外使用名為 ASP.NET 狀態服務的 Windows 服務的選項。ASP.NET supports the option of managing session state out-of-process using a Windows service called the ASP.NET state service. 方法用於 unmanaged 程式碼，在此服務所管理的工作階段資料。The method is used by unmanaged code in this service to manage the session data. 這個成員支援.NET Framework 基礎結構實作的 ASP.NET 狀態服務，且不想要直接從您的程式碼使用。This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure implementation of the ASP.NET state service and is not intended be used directly from your code. 如需工作階段狀態儲存體選項的詳細資訊，請參閱[工作階段狀態模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4)。For more information about session-state storage options, see [Session-State Modes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4).

summary.span: 停止儲存在 ASP.NET 狀態伺服器中的工作階段資料處理。

span.span: Stops the processing of session data stored in the ASP.NET state server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支援的管理工作階段狀態的-處理序外使用名為 ASP.NET 狀態服務的 Windows 服務的選項。ASP.NET supports the option of managing session state out-of-process using a Windows service called the ASP.NET state service. 方法可由 unmanaged 程式碼，在此服務來停止處理的工作階段資料。The method is used by unmanaged code in this service to stop processing the session data. 這個成員提供來支援 ASP.NET 狀態服務的.NET Framework 基礎結構實作，而且不想要直接從您的程式碼使用。This member is provided to support the .NET Framework infrastructure implementation of the ASP.NET state service and is not intended be used directly from your code. 如需工作階段狀態儲存體選項的詳細資訊，請參閱[工作階段狀態模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4)。For more information about session state storage options, see [Session-State Modes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4).
